name: cf-origin-rewrite
description: Rewrite requests from a vanity domain to a different, origin domain while preserving the path and query parameters

scripts.generate:openapi: concurrently --passthrough-arguments --kill-others --kill-signal SIGKILL --success command-1 "pnpm dev {@}" "wait-on -t 10s http://localhost:1337/openapi.json && curl http://localhost:1337/openapi.json | json > openapi.json && echo 'OpenAPI generated'"
